tag.name: shounen
tag.description: In the context of manga and associated media, shounen, literally meaning "youth" and often also specifically "boy", refers to a male audience roughly between the ages of 10 and 18. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: target audience
tag.description: Anime, like everything else in the modern world, is targeted towards specific audiences, both implicitly by the creators and overtly by the marketing. While categories are associated with specific sex and age groups, this is not a bar on the anime being enjoyed by people who don`t fit into that band; not only do crossover titles exist, but the categories also have a considerable following outside their main demographic, and a person might as well enjoy anime from all categories. Still, does not invalidate the usefulness of marking a title as one of the categories; the same themes will likely be treated differently in anime geared for different audiences. Only one should not jump the gun and assume that a title will be more or less serious or present content in this or that way due to its target audience, or conversely assume the target audience on the content and its presentation alone. As such, the audience categories help form a broad impression of how a title might work with the announced themes, but offer little to no in-depth information about specific content or its treatment. The audience categories originate from manga magazines, which group titles of a same intended audience into a magazine that is advertised as belonging to that category, and so manga-based anime will have the category from their parent work. As for anime based on other works, the audience is often debatable, but comparing information such as time slot to the manga-based anime generally helps figure out the most likely possibility. If the parent material was classified under multiple audiences over time (for example, it was originally shounen, but then as the plot changed and became more mature, it was reclassified as seinen), and the anime adapts parent material time periods covering multiple audiences, we tag all audiences covered by the anime adaptation.

tag.name: themes
tag.description: Themes describe the very central elements important to the anime stories. They set the backdrop against which the protagonists must face their challenges. Be it School Life, present Daily Life, Military action, Cyberpunk, Law and Order detective work, Sports, or the Underworld. These are only but a few of the more typical backgrounds for anime plots. Add to that a Conspiracy setting with a possible tragic outcome, the Themes span most of the imaginable subject matter relevant to anime.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: game
tag.description: Based on an interactive (even if minimally so) form of entertainment software, generally available for PCs, consoles or arcade machines.

tag.name: proxy battles
tag.description: In our terms, a proxy battle is a battle where humans use creatures/robots to do the fighting for them, either by commanding those creatures/robots or by simply evolving them/changing them into battle mode. Often the training aspect is also involved, or in some cases the proxies are nothing more than holographic representatives of some other variation of competition (like for example a card game). While many popular shounen anime fit under this category, it`s not limited to shounen anime.

episode.title: 転校生はスポーツの神!
The Transfer Student Is the Ace of Sports!
Tenkousei wa Sports no Kami!
episode.summary: Masato, the Ace of Sports, transfers to Aibo Academy. Ranma is eager to have Yuga battle him in a Buddyfight...but first, they have to clear their name when Masato accuses them of pulling pranks on PalTube. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激突! 遊びの神VS勉強の神!!
Clash of the Aces! Ace of Games versus Ace of Study!
Gekitotsu! Asobi no Kami VS Benkyou no Kami!!
episode.summary: Yuga meets Subaru, a brilliant but standoffish schoolmate known as the Ace of Study. At Ranma`s suggestion, Yuga and Subaru face off in a friendly Buddyfight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 友情対決! 友牙VSランマ!!
Friendship Battle! Yuga versus Ranma!
Yuujou Taiketsu! Yuuga vs Ranma!!
episode.summary: Garga adjusts to life in the human world. Yuga begins to feels guilty about getting a Buddy before his friend Ranma, just as Ranma challenges him to a Buddyfight with Garga as the prize. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 闘いの神! ガルガンチュア・ドラゴン!!
Deity of Combat! Gargantua Dragon!
Tatakai no Kami! Gargantua Dragon!!
episode.summary: Yuga and his best friend Ranma spend their days trying to become the next viral video stars. But when Yuga finds a mysterious card in his room, he`s drawn into the world of Buddyfight, where his very own Buddy monster is waiting for him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 降臨! 光の電神アマテラス!!
A Deity Descends! Electrodeity of Light, Amaterasu!
Kourin! Hikari no Ryuujin Amaterasu!!
episode.summary: The ABC Cup tournament goes on break. Miko`s connection to Yuga is finally revealed, and Miko unexpectedly gains a Buddy of her own: the deity Amaterasu. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: おとぎの国のメル! 解き放て, スバル様の呪い!
Mel`s Adventures in Fairyland! Reverse Prince Subaru`s Curse!
Otogi no Kuni no Meru! Tokihanate, Subaru-sama no Noroi!
episode.summary: Subaru`s next opponent in the ABC Cup tournament is Mel Yumegatari, a fairy tale fan with a crush on Subaru. Mel believes that Subaru is under a magical curse, and decides to save him by defeating him in a Buddyfight match. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ランマ猛攻! 勝つのはオレだぜィ!!
Ranma`s Wild Charge! I`m the One Who`ll Win!
Ranma Moukou! Katsu no wa Ore Dazi!!
episode.summary: Ranma is frustrated by Yuga and Garga getting all the attention, especially when a mysterious girl shows up and declares herself to be a fan. He decides to prove his worth as a Buddyfighter by defeating Yuga in their ABC Cup match. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ついにスタート! ABCカップ!!
It`s Finally Begun! The ABC Cup!
Tsui ni Start! ABC Cup!!
episode.summary: Aibo Academy`s annual tradition, the ABC Cup tournament has begun. Masato`s first opponent is Banjoe Onizuka, a brawler with a bad reputation. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 学園最強は誰だ!? 勝利を決めるカード!
Who`s the Academy`s Best Fighter? The Card That Decides Victory!
Gakuen Saikyou wa Dare Da!? Shouri o Kimeru Card!
episode.summary: Yuga and Masato continue to battle in the final round of the ABC Cup. Yuga`s newfound popularity begins to take its toll on Ranma. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ABCカップ決勝! 友牙VSマサト!!
ABC Cup Finals! Yuga versus Masato!
ABC Cup Kesshou! Yuuga vs Masato!!
episode.summary: Yuga and Masato prepare to face each other in the final round of the ABC Cup. But their pre-match interview takes an unexpected turn when the villainous PalTuber Da Dan makes an appearance. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 果たせリベンジ! 友牙VSスバル!!
Win the Rematch! Yuga versus Subaru!
Hatase Revenge! Yuuga vs Subaru!!
episode.summary: Ranma feels conflicted about all the attention that Yuga is getting as he heads into the ABC Cup semi-final match against Subaru. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 守れ平和を! 銀河超人コスモマン!!
Defend Peace! Galaxy Exalt, Cosmoman!
Mamore Heiwa o! Ginga Choujin Cosmoman!!
episode.summary: Masato discovers that his opponent in the next match, Mamoru Sekai, is secretly the heroic Cosmoman. When Cosmoman rescues him from a rampaging Illegal monster, Masato vows to help his opponent any way that he can. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ロストワールド! 凶乱魔竜ヴァニティ・骸・デストロイヤー!! ―前編―
Lost World! Vile Demonic Dragon, Vanity Husk Destroyer! Part 1
Lost World! Kyouran Ma Ryuu Vanity Kara Destroyer!! Zenpen
episode.summary: Yuga discovers that Ranma is moving away. Ranma challenges Yuga to one final Buddyfight, and reveals his new deck and new Buddy. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ショップ予選開始! 侍VS忍者!!
Shop Preliminaries Begin! Samurai Versus Ninja!
Shop Yosen Kaishi! Samurai vs Ninja!!
episode.summary: Yuga`s first opponent in the Ace Buddyfighter Play-offs is Kanesada Kaji, a master of Katana World and expert swordsman. Yuga learns Garga can adapt to different worlds, so he creates a new ninja-themed deck. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 強くなれ友牙! 新たなるスタート!!
Get Stronger, Yuga! A New Beginning!
Tsuyoku Nare Yuuga! Aratanaru Start!!
episode.summary: As Yuga comes to terms with Ranma`s departure, his friends try to cheer him up. Garcat, Gardog and Garbird take over Ran-Ga Channel. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ロストワールド! 凶乱魔竜ヴァニティ・骸・デストロイヤー!! －後編－
Lost World! Vile Demonic Dragon, Vanity Husk Destroyer! Part 2
Lost World! Kyouran Ma Ryuu Vanity Kara Destroyer!! Kouhen
episode.summary: Yuga and Ranma`s Buddyfight continues, as Ranma reveals his true feelings and unleashes the full power of the Lost World monsters. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: チェックメイト! 勉強の神VSチェスの天才!!
Checkmate! Ace of Study versus Chess Genius!
Checkmate! Benkyou no Kami vs Chess no Tensai!!
episode.summary: Subaru introduces Yuga and the gang to his friend Seiji Kido, a chess prodigy. Vile Ranma is looking for allies, and he sets his sights on Seiji. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新たな仲間? 悪くないダ★ダーン!?
Our New Ally? A Non-Evil Da Dan?!
Aratana Nakama? Warukunai Da Dan!?
episode.summary: The nasty PalTuber Da Dan offers to help Yuga and the gang improve Ran-Ga Channel, but when his true intentions are revealed Garga vows to make him pay by defeating him in a Buddyfight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 乱魔チャンネル開設!? ロストワールド再び!
The Vile Ranma Channel Debuts? The Return of Lost World!
Ranma Channel Kaisetsu!? Lost World Futatabi!
episode.summary: When Vile Ranma starts a new PalTube Channel in hopes of recruiting new Lost Deck users, Subaru challenges him to a Buddyfight. But with Seiji`s freedom and Subaru`s own fate on the line, the gang has a lot to lose! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 狙いはミコ! 奪われたネコ!?
Target: Miko! A Kidnapped Cat?!
Nerai wa Miko! Ubawareta Neko!?
episode.summary: Miko`s new monster wants to be her buddy and displace Amaterasu. Meanwhile, Da Dan takes a hostage to force Miko to promote his PalTube channel. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 友牙とバンジョウ! 炎のファイト!!
Yuga and Banjoe! A Fiery Fight!
Yuuga to Banjou! Honoo no Fight!!
episode.summary: Yuga`s final opponent in the Shop Preliminaries is Banjoe Onizuka. When Yuga learns that Banjoe’s feeling down after his loss to Masato, he does his best to cheer him up and reignite his fighting spirit. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マサトかカネサダか! ショップ予選ファイナル!!
Masato or Kanesada? Shop Preliminary Finals!
Masato ga Kanesada ka! Shop Yosen Final!!
episode.summary: When a member of the school`s Kendo Club needs help controlling her love for battle, Masato and Kanesada put on a Buddyfight demonstration for her. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 二次予選スタート! 乱魔からの挑戦状!!
The Second Round Begins! A Challenge from Vile Ranma!
Niji Yosen Start! Ranma kara no Chousenjou!!
episode.summary: As the second round of the Ace Buddyfighter Play-offs begin, Ranma challenges Yuga to a fight, thinking that if Subaru sees the power of Lost World in action he’ll be begging to join him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 魔法使いガルガ! マジックワールドのファイト!!
Mage Garga! A Magic World Buddyfight!
Mahou Tsukai Garuga! Magic World no Fight!!
episode.summary: Yuga finds a Magic World card that belonged to his father and decides to explore its possibilities. Meanwhile, the tournament AI assigns Yuga his next opponent, a wanna-be rock star named Note Hibikase. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ロスト第三のファイター! 最強竜現る!!
The Third Lost World Fighter! Enter the Max Dragons!
Lost Daisan no Fighter! Saikyou Ryuu Arawaru!!
episode.summary: Subaru meets the third member of Vile Ranma`s Lost World crew, Daijirou Kurayashiki. Masato reveals his past history with Daijirou and decides to challenge him to a Buddyfight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新たなるロストの仲間
A New Lost World Ally!
Aratanaru Lost no Nakama
episode.summary: Subaru’s forced to make a decision on Vile Ranma`s offer, and Yuga and the gang are shocked to learn that Subaru`s been meeting with the Lost World player. Meanwhile, a frustrated Light decides to take matters into his own hands. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 絆竜団誕生秘話! 強くなれアギト!!
The Secret Origin of the Linkdragon Order! Get Stronger, Agito!
Kizuna Ryuu Dan Tanjou Hiwa! Tsuyoku Nare Agito!!
episode.summary: The Linkdragon Order reminisce about how they first joined forces with Masato. Masato tries to achieve closure through another match with Daijirou. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 一撃必勝! モード・ガトリング!!
One Shot Victory! Gattling Mode!
Ichigeki Hisshou! Mode Gatling!!
episode.summary: Da Dan makes a deal with Vile Ranma to join Lost World, and then he and Yuga have a Buddyfight to determine who advances to the final tournament. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ボクだってやるぞ! バディファイト!!
I`m Going to Play Too! Buddyfight!
Boku Datte Yaruzo! Buddyfight!
episode.summary: Haru wants a Buddyfight deck for Christmas, so Yuga and the gang help him decide which world to choose. Light makes a troubling discovery about Vanity Husk Destroyer. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 勝つのはどっちだ!? スバルVSマサト!!
Who Will Win? Subaru Versus Masato!
Katsu no wa Docchi Da!? Subaru vs Masato!!
episode.summary: Ran-Ga Channel`s popularity is plummeting, so Masato and Subaru agree to help out by broadcasting their first Buddyfight match against each other. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 秩序の守護者 花園エデン
The Guardian of Order, Eden Hanazono!
Satsujo no Shugosha: Hanazono Eden
episode.summary: The final round competitors are invited to a party by the mysterious Eden Hanazono. Vile Ranma and Vanity Husk Destroyer initiate a plan to recruit Eden, while Garga learns of Eden`s tragic past. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大進化! 凶乱魔神竜ヴァニティ・刻・デストロイヤー!!

Light Kurouzu! Battle of Destiny!
Kurouzu Raito! Unmei no Tatakai!!
episode.summary: Yuga asks Light to help him prepare for a battle against Darkness Dragon World, while Light tries to keep his undercover activities a secret. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ダ★ダーン反乱! 禁断のクーデター!!
Da Dan Rebels! The Forbidden Coup d`Etat!
Da Dan Hanran! Kindan no Coup d`Etat!!
episode.summary: Yuga and his friends visit Saint Order Academy in an attempt to learn more about Eden. Seiji manipulates Da Dan into an open rebellion against Vile Ranma. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ガルガ大進化! 発動!! 神G・EVO!!!
Garga`s Major Evolution! Activate! Deity G.Evo!
Garuga Dai Shinka! Hatsudou!! Kami G Evo!!!
episode.summary: Yuga faces Eden in the first match of the finals. Garga reflects on his journey with Yuga, and hopes he can make his young Buddy’s dreams come true. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アンハッピー! 乱魔vs怨巳矢レイ!!
Unhappy! Vile Ranma versus Rei Urameshi!
Unhappy! Ranma vs Urameshi Rei!!
episode.summary: While preparing for his battle with Vile Ranma in the finals, the mysterious Rei Urameshi tries to sabotage his rivals. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最終決戦! マサトVS大志郎!!
Final Battle! Masato versus Daijirou!

episode.summary: Daijirou reflects on his past with Masato, as the two prepare to settle their grudge on the Buddyfight stage. Meanwhile, the Linkdragon Order wants to raise the stakes of the match. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: もどれ友よ! 願いを込めたキャスト!!
Come Back, My Friend! Casting a Spell with a Wish!
Modore Tomo yo! Negai o Kometa Cast!!
episode.summary: As their match approaches, Subaru tries to win back Seiji`s friendship. His latest attempt includes a special guest appearance on Ran-Ga Channel. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 神ファイターだヨ! 全員集合!!

Kami Fighter Da yo! Zen`in Shuugou!!
